data.description: Meticulously Maintained & Updated 2 Story Home Situated on a Beautifully Landscaped & Irrigated 1/2 Acre Set Against a Backdrop of Mature Pine Trees~~Enjoy Hardwood that Extends from the Inviting Foyer to the Volume Great Rm Featuring a Warm Natural Fireplace and Bright Wall of Windows Filling the Space w/ Natural Light~~The Chef & Entertainer will Love the Renovated Kitchen complete w/ Custom Natural Cherry Cabinetry, Granite Tops, Travertine Backsplash, Appliances & Hardwood that Flows into a Spacious Breakfast Area Open to the Great Rm~~Escape to the Comfortable Living Rm for Quiet Conversation w/ Friends~~A Formal Dining can also Function as a Convenient Office Space~~Retire to 1 of 4 Bedrooms including a Large Vaulted Master Suite w/ a Private Spa-like Bathroom~~Relax on the Deck in the Tree Lined Rear Yard~~3 Car Garage, 1st Fl Laundry and Full Basement~~Community Play Structure~~New Shingles 2017 & Furnace 2018~~Min US-23/I-96, Shopping, Restaurants, Brighton & Hartland~~Hurry
